channel.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?
channel.description: Just wondering how you guys found Moparscape. I found it one day when I was fed up of paying for membership on RS (also found it hard to level up), found out about RSPS (Sinzscape) and MSCP, I thought the idea of no membership was so cool, every item was available to F2P. Then I ran my own offline RSPS and realised it was boring. End of story.

item.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

google.com has been around for quite some time.

Read full topic

item.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I assume a lot of people go through this stage.;…but I went through this stage where I would play just constantly on random new RuneScape accounts. I was burned out I guess I couldn’t continue on my main at that time due to boredom. ( I want to say I had become F2P at that time but I can’t confirm/deny that )

Anyway, so I overheard this one guy talking abo0ut rsps/private servers. At that time I had no idea what it was, what to expect, I never even played anything called a private server for any type of game before. I did a google search a couple of days later when I went and made another account out of boredom. Moparscape was the first thing that popped up on Google so I went and started looking around and all. This was actually way back in like 2008/2009 but I didn’t register until later cause I was still paranoid of Moparscape.

The first rsps I ever played was this very basic, very laggy, rsps called AncientScape. I remember starting off in like Yanille/somewhere around that going what the hell am I supposed to do?

Read full topic
item.source: How did you find out about Moparscape?

item.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

I died in runescape and was 12 and was like “r u fkn kidding me m8, i need 2 fuk some nans” and searched on google how to play runescape private servers as I vaguely remember someone talking about it ingame. After some researching, getting a few viruses from free items generators (lmfao), I finally found runelocus. Where I found www.roxoscape.cmpoon.com After being advertised to join another server from that, it was a small server with 5 players to just chill on. He said I should learn to code and after more researching I found rune-server. For some reason my 12 year old mind couldn’t comprehend how that forum looked at the time and seemed weird to me so I found this site after.

Then I fucked your nan.

Read full topic
item.source: How did you find out about Moparscape?

item.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:30, topic:545501”]Someone posted some screenshots of Runescape with items everywhere on the ground (rare ones, expensive ones). This was late 2006.
Back in those days I was brainwashed to believe that you would never find a more wretched hive of scum an villainy than Runescape cheating websites. I guess Jagex was wrong.[/quote]
They were exceptionally good at bad mouthing and using scare tactics towards cheating sites.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

RandQm:

I searched for an alternative for rs after the first graphical updates in 07? and found frugooscape, which is how I discovered the rsps scene and tumbled here in my interest in working on one myself. I first was at RL tbh, there I saw something about mscp, came here and stayed here.

Same as you.

item.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Basically people kept spamming the hell out of moparisthebest forums in wrong sections etc, and thus moparscape forums were born Then it grew 10000x larger than mitb ever did.

item.title: How did you find out about Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Friend was talking about it to me while I was playing RuneScape in 2006, killing skeletons for whatever reason. At first when I visited the site, I didn’t know there was a forum nor did I know what was happening and the reason for music playing as the webclient loaded. I didn’t know what the Hell to do so I was scared and turned it off, came back like a month or two later and found the toplist page which didn’t understand, first server name was Blackscape.

Read full topic
item.source: How did you find out about Moparscape?
